Release notes release/0.15.3¶

Released 2022-10-27

Update of dependencies, enhancements to REST APIs and when running job.map() in a cloud setup

What’s Changed¶

  • Enable nbtasks auth env by @miraculixx in https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/pull/283

  • Enable swagger array objects by @miraculixx in https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/pull/281

  • upgrade dependencies by @miraculixx in https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/pull/295

  • Release 0.15.3 by @miraculixx in https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/pull/288

  • build 0.15.3 by @miraculixx in https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/pull/298

Full Changelog: https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/compare/0.15.2…release/0.15.3
